channel.title: Videos on Rebecca Vian’s site
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on Rebecca Vian’s site

item.title: Recital for Bachelor in Music
item.description: This is the recording of my Bachelor of Music Recital, that I held on the second of October 2019. Program: Hindemith, Harp sonata Prokofiev, Prelude in C Tournier, Feerié Britten, Suite for harp op. 83 Audio and Video editing: Natra Gabi.
